title: TP-Link Deco XE75 mesh system has Wi-Fi 6E, but you probably shouldnâ€™t buy it
content:
TP-Link has been selling routers for what seems like forever, but more recently, the company has branched into mesh Wi-Fi systems that can cover larger areas with a more reliable wireless network. TP-Link released the Dexo XE75 mesh system on Monday, which is built to support the new Wi-Fi 6E standard that has started to

The post TP-Link Deco XE75 mesh system has Wi-Fi 6E, but you probably shouldn’t buy it appeared first on xda-developers.
description: TP-Link has a new Deco XE75 mesh system that supports Wi-Fi 6E and the 6GHz band, but you probably shouldn't buy it.
